text:
Hello,

I want to crate Notes with Rich text Through the ``Note API`` is this something that I have to to before sending the payload to `<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/notes>` ,  or after the the payload is received ?

Hi,

Have you made sure that you have made  a `PATCH` request to that API ?

Hey <@U05JJCC63FE>, not sure what payload you’re talking about but I just did this on deals. After the deal was created I had a CCA that created a note on that deal and pinned it. I’m not at my computer currently but if you need help tomorrow, I’m happy to share some code.

Hello
I need help regarding subject.
While i am creating new email template through the API , need to include custom email subject.currently i am use below api url
<https://api.hubapi.com/content/api/v2/templates>
